hero.subtitle: Gap analysis, learning plans, salary benchmarks, role recommendations, and CV optimization ‚Äî all in under 2 minutes. Career coaching that used to cost $500/hour, now powered by AI.

features.title: Everything you need to navigate your career transition
features.subtitle: Powered by advanced AI analysis of your CV, target role requirements, and market data.

cards.title: CV Deep Analysis
cards.description: Upload your PDF resume and our AI extracts every skill, certification, and experience ‚Äî including ones you forgot to list.

cards.title: Gap Analysis
cards.description: See exactly what skills you're missing for your target role ‚Äî color-coded by severity with specific plans to close each gap.

cards.title: Salary Benchmarks
cards.description: Location-aware salary ranges for your current and target roles, plus negotiation tips specific to your experience.

cards.title: Role Recommendations
cards.description: Get 3 best-fit roles based on your profile ‚Äî with fit scores, salary ranges, and specific companies to target.

cards.title: Action Plan
cards.description: 30-day quick wins, 90-day skill building, and 12-month career trajectory ‚Äî each with specific resources and time estimates.

cards.title: Job Matching
cards.description: Paste any job posting and get an ATS match score, missing keywords, and specific CV rewrite suggestions.

howItWorks.title: From CV to career roadmap in 3 steps
howItWorks.subtitle: No sign-up required. Upload, answer a few questions, and get your personalized analysis.

steps.title: Upload Your CV
steps.description: Drag and drop your PDF resume. Our AI reads every detail ‚Äî skills, certifications, experience, and even implicit competencies you didn't explicitly list.

steps.title: Tell Us Your Goals
steps.description: Answer a quick questionnaire about your current role, target position, location, and salary expectations. Takes under 2 minutes.

steps.title: Get Your Career Roadmap
steps.description: In under 2 minutes, receive a comprehensive analysis: fit score, strengths, skill gaps, salary benchmarks, and a personalized action plan.

cta.title: Ready to accelerate your career?
cta.subtitle: Upload your CV and get a comprehensive career analysis in under 2 minutes. Free to use, no sign-up required.
cta.footer: No sign-up ‚Ä¢ No credit card ‚Ä¢ Results in under 2 minutes
